title: Get Help from Auntie Ethel
content:
this set of dialogue options again, and exchanges dialogue 4 to "Then you're of no use to me.". Choosing dialogue 3 upsets Auntie Ethel, kicking you out of her house. This ends Get Help from Auntie Ethel.

Not Getting Help from Auntie Ethel

Choosing dialogue 3 (Don't change the subject. Why is that woman really here?) will have Auntie Ethel tell you to mind your own business again. She chooses to talk more and only about your parasite. This will give you the following dialogue options.
